data.author: Brili, Inc.

changelog.release_notes: Brili for Pebble now supports the minimum activity time that can be set using the Brili mobile and web apps.
Brili for Pebble now awards stars based on the new task preferences that users can set in Parent Mode in the iOS, Android and web version. Earned stars can be viewed in the mobile and web apps.
This version improves memory management in Pebble Classic smartwatches for better stability.
v1.9 Corrects a bug that caused earned stars to not be counted correctly.
This version corrects a bug in a situation where there are more than 4 routines present for one child, causing routines numbered 4+ to not run.
v1.6 adds a button to reset routines from the Pebble
Brili for Pebble v1.5 does a better job of keeping its internet connection active during routines and fixes several bugs.
This version is now compatible with 3.x firmware on Pebble Classic and Classic Steel models.
Corrected another crashing issue affecting some users.
This release includes a fix for intermittent crashes on Pebble Watch.
This is the first release of Brili for Pebble. We look forward to your feedback.

data.description:
Introducing Brili for Pebble, the first ever wearable routine assistant for families.

Brili makes kids' daily routines come to life as a fun race against time. It guides them through activities like getting dressed and brushing teeth with the end goal in mind (e.g. leaving for school on time or bedtime). Briliâ€™s dynamic timers automatically adjust to make sure everything gets done by your deadline, even if you started late.

With Brili for Pebble, you or your child can:
- see the current task and a picture of it
- see a visual countdown timer
- receive vibration prompts when time is running low and when time has run out
- mark activities complete, which automatically starts the timer on the next activity

Every minute saved by staying on task is banked for a desirable activity at the end. Brili for Pebble allows you to access daily routines you create for your kids (or yourself!) on the Brili platform using our iOS, Android or web clients.

Note: While Brili for Pebble can function without the app installed on your paired device, the Brili smartphone, tablet or web app is required to create and manage routines. Get it at http://brili.co.

latest_release.release_notes: Brili for Pebble now supports the minimum activity time that can be set using the Brili mobile and web apps.

data.title: Brili for Pebble
